Reviews.Title: Ok but not there yet
Reviews.Author: G. Thomson
Reviews.Content: This knob installs pretty easily. Battery access is also easy with the removal of a small screw on the inside upper portion above the knob. However, the problem comes when you unlock the door from the outside, then come inside and try to turn the center to lock it. It would not turn without a lot of effort. I unlocked the door using the keypad and then locked it again with the outside keypad and it seemed to work fine. Once again, using the inside knob and turning the lock it was near impossible to turn. I called the 800 number for support and the gentleman told me to hold the inside of the center lock while putting the code in to unlock the door. Holding the center lock in place while it is trying to unlock the door you can feel it start to move but stopping it from actually moving the locking mechanism makes the clutch reset. This fixed the problem in being able to unlock from the outside come inside and then turn the lock to once again lock the door. However, I keep having to do this over about every 2 or 3 times when I unlock the door from the outside. It appears that this clutch is not working properly or that depending on where this clutch ends up in the process can cause the inside lock to be turned slightly (being neither exactly horizontal or exactly vertical. Very annoying. The knob works fine when using the pad to unlock and lock the door. However, when using the inside lock it will hang and is nearly impossible to turn about every 2 or 3 times. Cannot recommend.

Reviews.Title: Installs fast and works great with consistent performance
Reviews.Author: KR
Reviews.Content: First, I read the other 16 reviews for this knob before purchasing.  Luckily, I have not experienced the problems that others had experienced... perhaps the internal design was modified since those reviews were written.I purchased the polished brass version.  While not the best looking brass finish that I have seen, I have no real complaint.  What the knob may lack in quality brass finish it more than makes up in functionality.The knob installed very quickly, just as installing any other basic door knob with the exception of putting a wire through the door hole.  I do not have a deadbolt on my door, but because of the height of this unit on the interior and exterior sides (there is a sizeable battery box on the interior), some may experience problems when trying to fit this and a deadbolt.Connecting this deadbolt to my Insteon Morninglinc module and Smartlinc was very easy.  Although I cannot check the status of the lock, I can lock and unlock remotely via smartphone or computer, if needed.Operation of the knob through the keypad is successful about 90% of the time.  The other 10%, one of two things happen: 1) the keypad misses the first digit pressed, and spits back "error" beeps; or 2) the door tries to unlock (motor spins), but does not actually unlock.  Because these are rather rare occurences, they do not bother me much at all.  To address the first problem, be sure to press the buttons fully, and listen for the confirmation "beep" after *each* digit pressed.  To address the second problem, simply press the *lock* button on the keypad to reset the motor and lock, and then enter your code again.  In my experience, the second problem was usually caused by myself or my wife failing to fully turn the lock/unlock knob inside the house, sometimes leaving the knob partially between locked and unlocked.I really enjoy using this lock, and the ability to enter the house without keys (garage door opener is a backup) is really great.I wouldn't hesitate to buy anotehr of these locks and encourage others to try this product.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: KPG "c4 guy"
Reviews.Content: I love this door lock.  I usually don't even write reviews, but this was worth it.  I bought an extra remote for my wife.  Installation was easy. The unit seems pretty heavy duty, and strong.  The door knob itself is a little harder to turn then other door handles, but this was the nicest doorlock set I could find, and I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: keyless entry is awesome
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I really like this lock. The hands free action is very convenient. It was pretty easy to install and program. It looks very modern and doesn't seem cheap or flimsy. It comes with two (mechanical) keys and one remote fob. The key pad flashes green when unlocked and red when locked. Things to keep in mind: 1) this is not a deadbolt, just a handle lock 2) if you already have a deadbolt in your door, this lock might not fit under it because it's pretty tall. I had to put this new lock on top, and the deadbolt on the bottom 3) it takes 4 "AA" batteries. Heed the instructions warnings about only new batteries. The only thing I don't like is that it seems pretty expensive.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Victoria C. Chen
Reviews.Content: Really easy to use and it's awesome not to have to look for keys anymore.  Especially when I have a handful of groceries, don't have to drop the bags look for key.  Very convenient!

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend.
Reviews.Author: MIke Bristow
Reviews.Content: When I installed the keypad last December it worked flawlessly for four months of light use. Then I had the same problem as G. Thomson, another reviewer who also rated this product two stars.

Reviews.Title: Reliable &strong;
Reviews.Author: James Covington
Reviews.Content: This lock is good value. Well made, easy to set up & install. Had it for a while now with no issues. It is still on it's first battery.

Reviews.Title: hasn't worked from day one.
Reviews.Author: J. O.  Va "Gluten free baker -va"
Reviews.Content: The morning star HKK antique finish keyless pad hasn't ever worked. It didn't want to use the 4 coded numbers and at first would accept and open with only the last 2 numbers. Then it would only accept the 3rd number [ made beep sound] and still wouldn't open.  We had to use a key to get in most the time.FOR SUPPORT We tried to call 2 different phone numbers, one from box and one from web site...both said "mailbox full" can't leave message.Email Info site and customer service....no response.I just ordered a new one from a different company. Don't know what I'm suppose to do with this one! Oh, yes, we did try new batteries!If you always want to use the key, THIS ONES FOR YOU!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Kaplan "SoccerStar"
Reviews.Content: The unit looks and operates exactly as you hope it will. Its the first door knob I have ever installed and I, have to say, the included instructions were fairly poor but that only set me back about 20 minutes. Besides that, it is clean, well constructed, and the electronics have been perfect. The remote is great and the keys feel waaay better than you think they will. Great product and cheaper than the other units I saw at Lowe's and home depot that had similar features.

Reviews.Title: Solution to the key problem
Reviews.Author: Jayhawk
Reviews.Content: I bought this and two Morning Industry dead bolts while doing a remodeling 2 years ago.  Now I don't have to hide an extra key outside or give a key to a neighbor, house cleaner or relative.  I just give them their own code.  My wife has not used a key since the remodeling.  We have a electronic opener that allows us to unlock the door from the car before I bring in the packages.  A couple of reasons it is not 5 stars.  (1) the screw that holds the battery cover screws into plastic that has stripped out.  With a little steal wool I get it to hold but a strong slam of the door and it falls off;  (2) a plastic piece of the latch broke recently.  Morning Industry is replacing the latch but a little heaver build would be nice.  (3) the door knob is very slick and difficult for children or elderly to get a grip.  Overall, I love keypad  entries.

Reviews.Title: Convenient entry lock
Reviews.Author: Ray Hoffman
Reviews.Content: Everything works well, except the distance for remote in the car (about 20'), otherwise, it is great not to use a key.Still going -(2-25-2013) starting to beep occasionally, several times after locking, batteries ok, so not sure what is happening at this point - very satisfiedwith its performance thus far.

Reviews.Title: No more lost keys
Reviews.Author: Peab
Reviews.Content: We love this entry system. It matches our door really well and the best part, we can all get in the house without a key. I even use the remote, which is nice when my hands are full or have the dog on the leash. The lighted keypad is helpful when we come home later than expected and don't have the porch light on. I entered an easy to remember code for each of my two teenage daughters and my wife. Now when the kids come home from school, dance, sports, clubs, or whatever they can get in without having to remember to bring their house key. I feel better knowing that if I can't be there, they are not stuck outside until my wife or I get home. It seems easily as sturdy as our old keyed lock and the batteries haven't worn out in the 9 months we've used the unit. The instructions say it gives a low battery warning as well.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: After the first one arrived in terrible condition (perhaps dropped, kicked, whatever, during shipping), Amazon sent a replacement at no cost.  We would never go back to a regular doorknob.

Reviews.Title: Well Built and High Quality
Reviews.Author: Brad J. Schmiling
Reviews.Content: Must be made in the U.S.A. because this product is high quality. Very easy installation and very easy programming. I was hesitant to buy it because it was not rated, so I thought I'd be the first one to leave a review to say "you won't be disappointed".

Reviews.Title: It works, most of the time..... and Its very attractive and easy to set up, but I can't endorse a lock that won't work sometimes
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M Forant
Reviews.Content: The remote does not work, which was the primary reason I bought this particular lock.  The set up was easy with a few trouble shooting issues.  Its an attractive lock and I like the function where you can set up multiple entry codes.  My main beef with this lock is that sometimes the buttons just don't work!  Whole point of buttons is to let me in my house.  For several days they will work, then all of the sudden, a couple of the buttons I need won't work so I have to fish out my keys.  For what it costs, I would not buy it again.  I'll be replacing it sometime this summer so I don't have to worry about getting locked out of my house if I'm depending on it to work.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SECURITY DOOR LOCK!!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Starks "Robert S."
Reviews.Content: Very good door lock! Now I don't have to mess with keys anymore! Remote control works great for letting me in or unlocking door for guest from across my house! Can even give temporary passwords to guest! I also recommend the deadbolt style!

Reviews.Title: VERY UNRELIABLE
Reviews.Author: Media Enterprises, Inc.
Reviews.Content: I have had this for a number of years. I keep giving up on it when it doesn't work right. Today I went back to see if I can get it to work properly. However, after I program it, it seems to work once. Then it works on the second try. Sometimes it doesn't work at all. There is no consistency to it. I would recommend not buying it.

Reviews.Title: Kid proofed my office
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Brian"
Reviews.Content: This lock is built like a tank.  My wife and kids can not enter my office and play with my electronics.  I wish I had bought this sooner.

Reviews.Title: Good Lock
Reviews.Author: DJ in Texas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter. She installed it on her mud room entry door. It makes getting in and out of the house really easy with kids super easy. That remote is a great idea. The install is very easy.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Marta A McDonald "Margaret Marie"
Reviews.Content: Not happy as it can not be rekeyed. Many tries were made to the phone number that was listed with out any answering. Plan to return it no one wants to carry a lot of keys for different house doors as a back up.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS
Reviews.Author: thandlrwashere
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money, these are very cheaply made.  All internal parts are plastic, I am on my third interior knob as the plastic gears inside the other two both broke.  My father bought one at lowes has lasted five years never changed the batteries.  This one has me changing twice a year and locks me out each time.  The last one IS received needs pliers to lock and binds.  Tech support sad all I have to do buy a new one and pay to ship mine back they will fix it and send back to me.  All i have to do is pay shipping and for a second knob and i just paid to ship the broken one.  I am going to buy a different one.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed, the unlock keeps getting hung up
Reviews.Author: kevtink
Reviews.Content: I tried 2 different units,poorly constructedwhen using the buttons to unlock, the unlock would get stick, and I had to use the keys to unlock.this was not an anomaly, it would happened periodically,I ordered a replacement, same thingI switched to a schlage, about the same price.no issues.

Reviews.Title: Basically junk
Reviews.Author: Lonnie "Lon"
Reviews.Content: Update!  I have two of these locks.  The one on the main door going into the house works just okay most of the time.  However every few months I have to open it up and lubricate it the way as I was instructed by Morning Industry support.The other one however on the unheated and detached garage hardly ever works especially in colder weather.  I have 4 of these locks in total and keep switching the one on the garage door.  Right now it is working after lubricating the replacement.  But this won't last long.  What it does is lock up tight and you can not even turn the release inside manually with your fingers.  It would take a pair of pliers to turn it.  So I take it off and replace it with a freshly lubricated one.  I am using Vaseline for a lubricant right now but have tried everything under the sun.  These locks are basically junk and I am very disappointed.Right now I am exploring other options in a keyless entry system.  Don't waste your time or money on this junk.

Reviews.Title: need one for my office
Reviews.Author: Itech
Reviews.Content: After having the deadbolt install at my house, I am getting spoiled and hated to use key for my office. As my cars are all keyless and the extra key on the car remote really bother me. I shop online and found there is a lever type but I opt to get a knob from here. It as nice as the deadbolt and work great at my office as the backset is a little different from my home. I do not have the interent link with this one but the keypad and remote work so well together. I programming my home remote to this office lock and now I can use one remote to open my house and my office.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: Used in conjunction with the morninglinc from smarthome I am extremely happy. Good quality and great reliability.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with standard doorknob and deadbolt spacing
Reviews.Author: Carl L
Reviews.Content: Took the doorknob out of the box and it was reasily apparent that were it to be installed the battery pack and the key pad would interfere with the deadbolt installed above the doorknob. I have a metal door with standard openings foor doorknob and deadbolt, re drilling holes is not an option.  I suppose the unit could be installed inverted but then the key pad would be below the doorknob and harder to access and the numbers would be upside down. So I'll be returning this unit--too bad as beyond this design flaw, the unit looks like its high quality. I guess it would be suitable to those that do not have deadbolts installed on their doors.

ProductInfo.Features:
Simple programming
Accepts up to 10, 2-8 digit codes
Accepts up to 10 Morning Industry RM-RF remote controls
Back-lit keypad
RM-RF Remote Controls work up to 30-Feet away (without obstructions)
ProductInfo.Name: Morning Industry QKK-01OB Keypad and Remote Control Knob Entry, Oil Rubbed Bronze
